title: UNDERDOG - 70's display font
content:
Looking for an ID on this wavy 70's style display font used to spell UNDERDOG on this vintage book.

many thanks in advance for any help,  
Danny

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [IMG\_4710.PNG](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312040459/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_4710.PNG) | 1.14 MB |
author: Danny_Miller

comments.content:
Tip Top by Julius Klinkhartdt, Leipzig pre 1914.  
Don
